name.quote: One day you will wake up and there won't be any more time to do the things you've always wanted. Do it now
name.author: Paulo Coelho

name.quote: As we express our gratitude, we must never forget that the highest appreciation is not to utter words, but to live by them.
name.author: John F. Kennedy

name.quote: Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
name.author: Jim Ryun

name.quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
name.author: Mark Twain

name.quote: Kindness is the language which the deaf can hear and the blind can see.
name.author: Mark Twain

name.quote: Kindness is the language which the deaf can hear and the blind can see.
name.author: Mark Twain

name.quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.
name.author: Nelson Mandela

name.quote: With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts.
name.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

name.quote: Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it.
name.author: Charles R. Swindoll

name.quote: My mission in life is not merely to survive, but to thrive; and to do so with some passion, some compassion, some humor, and some style.
name.author: Maya Angelou

name.quote: Good friends, good books and a sleepy conscience: this is the ideal life.
name.author: Mark Twain

name.quote: Don't let schooling interfere with your education.
name.author: Mark Twain

name.quote: No matter what happens in life, be good to people. Being good to people is a wonderful legacy to leave behind.
name.author: Taylor Swift

name.quote: Tact is the art of making a point without making an enemy.
name.author: Isaac Newton

name.quote: To be able to look back upon ones life in satisfaction, is to live twice.
name.author: Khalil Gibran

name.quote: A little knowledge that acts is worth infinitely more than much knowledge that is idle.
name.author: Khalil Gibran

name.quote: If you can dream it, you can do it.
name.author: Walt Disney

name.quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
name.author: Walt Disney

name.quote: Character cannot be developed in ease and quiet. Only through experience of trial and suffering can the soul be strengthened, ambition inspired, and success achieved.
name.author: Helen Keller

name.quote: Be sure you put your feet in the right place, then stand firm.
name.author: Abraham Lincoln

name.quote: Girl power is about loving yourself and having confidence and strength from within, so even if you're not wearing a sexy outfit, you feel sexy.
name.author: Nicole Scherzinger

name.quote: You can either see yourself as a wave in the ocean or you can see yourself as the ocean.
name.author: Oprah Winfrey

name.quote: We are what we pretend to be, so we must be careful about what we pretend to be.
name.author: Kurt Vonnegut

name.quote: I want to stand as close to the edge as I can without going over. Out on the edge you see all kinds of things you can't see from the center.
name.author: Kurt Vonnegut

name.quote: We have to continually be jumping off cliffs and developing our wings on the way down.
name.author: Kurt Vonnegut

name.quote: And I asked myself about the present: how wide it was, how deep it was, how much was mine to keep
name.author: Kurt Vonnegut

name.quote: I tell you, we are here on Earth to fart around, and don't let anybody tell you different.
name.author: Kurt Vonnegut
